t:
After telling her that she was raped, she looked up at her mom for some consolation.

“Well, I know you think that it's not your fault, but it really is”,
her mom said with a satisfied smile,
“now you know better than to go out dressed like that, don't you?”

                      – Somewhere, some girl
c:
Her mom always supported dad.





Disclaimer: I do not promote hateful behavior. I don't agree with the outcome of the story, the reason I wrote it in third person instead of my usual first person style. The story just portraits a sad reality, which, I wish, would stop.
